title: Wooden Vertebre
description: Carved out of a block of cherry wood using a CNC 5 axis router and Fusion360, this object was 3D scanned from a boar's vertebre. This self-directed project pushes the capabilities of the CNC machine to the max. Careful planning of toolpaths keeps too much material from being removed at a time, allowing even the thinnest of features to remain intact. Made in Autodesk's Artist Residency at Pier 9.
